metadata.title: CVE-2024-21783 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Integer overflow for some Intel(R) VPL software before version 24.1.4 mayallow an authenticated user to potentially enable escalation of privilegevia local access.

criterions.comment: intel-mediasdk package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
onevpl-intel-gpu package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
